# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_rescompiler_bin
  TOOL_rescompiler_dependency
  tools/rescompiler/bin
  rescompiler
)

add_executable(ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm14-ut)


target_include_directories(ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm14-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm14/ut
)

target_link_libraries(ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm14-ut PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  llvm14-lib-IR
  lib-ExecutionEngine-MCJIT
  llvm14-lib-Linker
  lib-Target-X86
  Target-X86-AsmParser
  Target-X86-Disassembler
  lib-Transforms-IPO
  lib-Transforms-ObjCARC
  lib-ExecutionEngine-PerfJITEvents
  library-cpp-resource
  minikql-codegen-llvm14
)

target_allocator(ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm14-ut
  cpp-malloc-jemalloc
)

target_link_options(ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm14-ut PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lpthread
  -lrt
  -ldl
)

target_sources(ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm14-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm14/ut/codegen_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm14/ut/c2b0968de2dc7c0881b1dfb523b401f5.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm14/ut/codegen_ut_llvm_deps.h
)


copy_file(
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/codegen_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm14/ut/codegen_ut.cpp
)

add_custom_command(
  OUTPUT
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/128_bit.ll.14.bc
  DEPENDS
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/128_bit.ll
  COMMAND
  ${LLVMAS}
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/128_bit.ll
  -o
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/128_bit.ll.14.bc
)

add_custom_command(
  OUTPUT
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm14/ut/Funcs_merged.14.bc
  DEPENDS
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/fib.cpp.14.bc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/sum_sqr.cpp.14.bc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/sum_sqr2.cpp.14.bc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/str.cpp.14.bc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/128_bit.cpp.14.bc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/128_bit.ll.14.bc
  COMMAND
  ${LLVMLINK}
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/fib.cpp.14.bc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/sum_sqr.cpp.14.bc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/sum_sqr2.cpp.14.bc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/str.cpp.14.bc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/128_bit.cpp.14.bc
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/128_bit.ll.14.bc
  -o
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm14/ut/Funcs_merged.14.bc
)

add_custom_command(
  OUTPUT
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm14/ut/Funcs_optimized.14.bc
  DEPENDS
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm14/ut/Funcs_merged.14.bc
  COMMAND
  ${LLVMOPT}
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm14/ut/Funcs_merged.14.bc
  -o
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm14/ut/Funcs_optimized.14.bc
  -internalize-public-api-list=fib#sum_sqr#sum_sqr2#sum_sqr_128#sum_sqr_128_ir#str_size
  -passes="default<O2>,globalopt,globaldce,internalize"
)

copy_file(
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/codegen_ut_llvm_deps.h.txt
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm14/ut/codegen_ut_llvm_deps.h
)

set_property(
  TARGET
  ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm14-ut
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  1
)

add_yunittest(
  NAME
  ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm14-ut
  TEST_TARGET
  ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm14-ut
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm14-ut
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  SMALL
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm14-ut
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)

llvm_compile_cxx(ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm14-ut
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/fib.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/fib.cpp.14.bc
  ${CLANGPLUSPLUS}
  -Wno-unknown-warning-option
  -emit-llvm
)

llvm_compile_cxx(ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm14-ut
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/sum_sqr.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/sum_sqr.cpp.14.bc
  ${CLANGPLUSPLUS}
  -Wno-unknown-warning-option
  -emit-llvm
)

llvm_compile_cxx(ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm14-ut
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/sum_sqr2.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/sum_sqr2.cpp.14.bc
  ${CLANGPLUSPLUS}
  -Wno-unknown-warning-option
  -emit-llvm
)

llvm_compile_cxx(ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm14-ut
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/str.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/str.cpp.14.bc
  ${CLANGPLUSPLUS}
  -Wno-unknown-warning-option
  -emit-llvm
)

llvm_compile_cxx(ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm14-ut
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/128_bit.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/ut/128_bit.cpp.14.bc
  ${CLANGPLUSPLUS}
  -Wno-unknown-warning-option
  -emit-llvm
)

resources(ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm14-ut
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm14/ut/c2b0968de2dc7c0881b1dfb523b401f5.cpp
  INPUTS
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/codegen/llvm14/ut/Funcs_optimized.14.bc
  KEYS
  /llvm_bc/Funcs
)

vcs_info(ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm14-ut)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-library-yql-minikql-codegen-llvm14-ut
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
